actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: Target grappled (escape DC 10); until grapple ends, target restrained and octopus can't use tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: While underwater, creates a 5-foot-radius heavily obscuring cloud for 1 minute (dispersed by strong current); after releasing, can Dash as a bonus action.
